nodes.text: The DH-17 blaster rifle was a blaster rifle that commonly served as a primary combat weapon by Rebel soldiers during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire, though it was not as common as the A280 rifle.The weapon was also used by Bespin Wing Guard, the security forces on Cloud City. The blaster rifle was manufactured by BlasTech Industries. It had a fully automatic mode as well as the capability of switching into a unique mode that allowed the user to fire charged-shots at their target. This charged-shot mode was common in many types of blasters during the Jedi Civil War and the Dark Wars.
The DH-17 serves as the Rebel soldier's primary weapon in the Battlefront video game series. It also appears in another video game, Star Wars: The Force Unleashed.
